FITQUEST APPLICATION: SUMMARY TERMS AND CONDITIONS

By using the FitQuest application, you are deemed to have automatically agreed, understood, and consented to comply with the following Summary Terms & Conditions and our Privacy Policy:

1. BINDING AGREEMENT
Your continued use implies absolute acceptance of these Terms and our Privacy Policy. Any update to these documents shall be immediately binding.

2. ACCOUNT AND SECURITY
You bear full responsibility for the confidentiality of your account username and password. You must ensure all registration information is accurate and kept current.

3. USER DATA AND PRIVACY
We collect and process your running activity, location, and personal data strictly to provide and enhance the FitQuest service. Your data usage rights are detailed in our Privacy Policy.

4. DISCLAIMER OF RESPONSIBILITY
FitQuest is solely a fitness monitoring tool. We assume no liability for any injuries, health issues, or fitness outcomes achieved. Crucial: Always consult a healthcare professional before starting or changing any exercise routine.

5. INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY RIGHTS (IPR)
The entire application, including source code, interface design, and the FitQuest logo, is our exclusive property and is protected by IPR laws. You are strictly prohibited from copying, modifying, reverse-engineering, or distributing this content without prior written consent.

6. GOVERNING LAW
These Terms and Conditions shall be governed by the laws of the Republic of Indonesia.

7. CONTACT POINT
For any official inquiries, support, or complaints, please contact our team via email at NichoNichoni143@gmail.com.

Thank you for choosing and embarking on this adventure with FitQuest!
